message.name: ERR_SLOT_XRV_NAME_EXIST
message.locale: A slot with the name "%1s" already exists at this daily schedule. Please use a different name.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_FV_STARTTIME_EMPTY
message.locale: Slot start time must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_FV_ENDTIME_EMPTY
message.locale: Slot end time must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_XFV_STARTTIME
message.locale: Slot end time must not be before slot start time.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_XFV_STARTTIME_ENDTIME_EQUAL
message.locale: Invalid Slot Times. Start time cannot be equal to end time.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_XRV_SLOTTIMES_OVERLAP
message.locale: The slot times cannot overlap with an existing slot for this schedule.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_XRV_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot modify this slot as it has been canceled.
You cannot modify this slot as it has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_XRV_EXCEEDMAXWORKUNITS
message.locale: The modified number of work items must be less than or equal to the maximum number of scheduled work units for this slot.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_RV_SCHEDULEDWORK_STILL_EXIST
message.locale: This slot cannot be canceled as there is currently time scheduled for work units associated with this slot.
This slot cannot be cancelled as there is currently time scheduled for work units associated with this slot.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_XRV_STARTDATE_AFTER_POSITIONSLOT_STARTDATE
message.locale: Start date must not be later than the start date of any associated positions.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_XRV_ENDDATE_BEFORE_POSITIONSLOT_ENDDATE
message.locale: End date must not be earlier than the end date of any associated positions.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_XRV_STARTDATE_BEFORE_LOCATION_SCHEDULE_STARTDATE
message.locale: Start date must not be earlier than the start date of the location schedule.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_XRV_ENDDATE_AFTER_LOCATION_SCHEDULE_STARTDATE
message.locale: End date must not be later than the start date of the next location schedule.

message.name: ERR_SLOT_XRV_STARTDATE_AFTER_LOCATION_SCHEDULE_STARTDATE
message.locale: Start date must not be later than the start date of the next location schedule.
